scripts.build: bun run build:ts && bun run build:rust && bun run build:python
scripts.build:ts: test -d typescript && cd typescript && bun run build || echo 'TypeScript build skipped - no typescript directory'
scripts.build:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo build --release || echo 'Rust build skipped - no rust directory'
scripts.build:python: test -d python && cd python && (python3 -m build 2>/dev/null || pyproject-build) || echo 'Python build skipped - no python directory'
scripts.dev: test -d typescript && cd typescript && bun --hot build.ts || echo 'Dev skipped - no typescript directory'
scripts.test: bun run test:ts && bun run test:python
scripts.test:ts: test -d typescript && cd typescript && vitest run || echo 'TypeScript tests skipped - no tests found'
scripts.test:python: test -d python && cd python && pytest -p no:anchorpy --asyncio-mode=auto || echo 'Python tests skipped'
scripts.typecheck: test -d typescript && tsc --noEmit -p typescript/tsconfig.json || echo 'Typecheck skipped - no typescript directory'
scripts.lint: test -d typescript && bunx @biomejs/biome check --write ./typescript || echo 'Lint skipped - no typescript directory'
scripts.lint:check: test -d typescript && bunx @biomejs/biome check ./typescript || echo 'Lint check skipped - no typescript directory'
scripts.lint:python: test -d python && cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format . || echo 'Python lint skipped'
scripts.lint:python:fix: test -d python && cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format . || echo 'Python lint fix skipped'

INSTAGRAM_PROXY.description: Proxy URL for Instagram API requests
